        Display an AlertDialog

        Parameters:
        title - optional, title
        message - to display
        positiveButton - optional, button text
        cancelable - able to cancel
        callback - callback of click ok button

      • displayConfirmDialog

        public static android.support.v7.app.AlertDialog.Builder displayConfirmDialog(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                                                              java.lang.String title,
                                                                              java.lang.String message,
                                                                              java.lang.String positiveButton,
                                                                              java.lang.String negativeButton,
                                                                              boolean cancelable,
                                                                              kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super android.content.DialogInterface,? super java.lang.Boolean,kotlin.Unit> callback)

        Display an AlertDialog with confirmation/cancellation options

        Parameters:
        title - optional, title
        message - to display
        positiveButton - optional, possitive button text. Defaults to true
        negativeButton - optional, negative button text. Defaults to false
        cancelable - optional, cancelable. Defaults to true
        callback - callback which includes the option selected by the user. True if the user pressed the possitive button, false otherwise.

        Parameters:

        message - message
        Returns:
        DialogInterface which allows the dismissal of the ProgressDialog
